item.title: 1.0.10c Reaper/King win conditions?
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
Just saw a Reaper with 2 souls going into night with lone king and Reaper lost.

Seriously can we just remove the whole autoresolve for Reaper at this point? Sucks to see the hardest win in the game get robbed because no one is willing to fix it. If reaper has 2 souls HE WINS EVERYTIME, but no, the game makes him lose even though the only loss condition is he dies of a heart attack before clicking empower on his reap and clicking on the king.
